description.value:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell.

You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you're wielding. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra 1d6 damage of a type depending on the school of the spell you just cast.

  • Abjuration @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.GbbwJhwSNLw06XpO]{force damage},
  • Conjuration or Transmutation @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.E8MiV00QEhH5n18L]{the same type as the weapon},
  • Divination, Enchantment, or Illusion @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.ZSgB3imGveukWUxs]{mental damage},
  • Evocation a type the spell dealt, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.GbbwJhwSNLw06XpO]{force damage} if the spell didn't deal damage,
  • Necromancy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.G1IRkppxJCYdfqXo]{negative damage}
